tool.name: Krona by group
tool.help:
.. class:: warningmark
**WARNING**. This tool requires **all consensus** files of every sample in **.txt** format.\
.. class:: infomark
**What is a Krona chart?**\
Krona make uses of circle graphics to represent and explore hierarchical data in different layers, offering an interactive metagenomic visualitation.\
**Example**\
.. image:: ${static_path}/images/iontorrent/krona1.png :height: 600 :width: 800
Krona charts count with multiple tools:
- **Max depth**: change the number of circles shown in the chart.
- **Font size**: change the letter font size of krona charts.
- **Chart size**: change the size of the chart.
- **Collapse**: simplify different wedges.
- **Snapshot**: creates an image of the pie chart.
- **Link**: create a link of krona charts.
- **?**: krona documentation.
In the upper right corner there are different charts. They display percentages for every area of the chart.\
